dsOverview.title: New Zealand Aircraft Data, 1978Dec22-1988Jun30

summary.p: This dataset contains aircraft reports from New Zealand. Each report contains date, aircraft ID, location, temperature, and wind information.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: NZ/NIWA > National Institute of Water and Atmospheric Research Ltd, New Zealand

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Temperature > Air Temperature
EARTH SCIENCE > Atmosphere > Atmospheric Winds > Flight Level Winds
